snippet: Don’t try to punish them. Just make getting an exemption harder.
abstract: Op-Ed article by global health Prof Saad B Omer contends that most effective way to convince skeptical parents to vaccinate their children is to inform them and steer them toward responsible decision, rather than castigating them or eliminating exceptions to vaccination rule; argues states would be best served by allowing exemptions but making them more difficult to obtain, approach that balances individual rights and public health.
lead_paragraph: Don’t try to punish them. Just make getting an exemption harder.

headline.print_headline: How to Handle the Vaccine Skeptics
headline.main: How to Handle the Vaccine Skeptics
